bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Selecting and Testing Jackets for Cables
IEEE Guide for Selecting and Testing Jackets for Cables

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Jackets furnish mechanical protection for cables during installation and heat cycling. Jackets retard the ingress of water and earth chemicals into the underlying core. Jackets over metallic shields, sheaths and concentric neutral wires also provide protection against corrosion.

Jackets furnish mechanical protection for cables during installation and heat cycling. Jackets retard the ingress of water and earth chemicals into the underlying core. Jackets over metallic shields, sheaths and concentric neutral wires also provide protection against corrosion.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
